member.name: T:InputBehaviourPrototype
member.summary: A simple example of Fusion input collection. This component should be on the same GameObject as the .

member.name: T:NetworkInputPrototype
member.summary: Example definition of an INetworkStruct.

member.name: T:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1
member.summary: Derive from this class for different types. Derived manager will only find that spawn point type, allowing for separate handling of player spawn points from other spawn-able items such as AI.

member.name: F:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1.Sequence
member.summary: How spawn points will be selected from the collection.

member.name: F:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1.BlockingLayers
member.summary: LayerMask for which physics layers should be used for blocked spawn point checks.

member.name: F:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1.BlockedCheckRadius
member.summary: The search radius used for detecting if a spawn point is blocked by an object.

member.name: F:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1._spawnPoints
member.summary: Serialized collection of all of the type T found in the same scene as this component.

member.name: M:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1.CollectSpawnPoints(Fusion.NetworkRunner)
member.summary: Find all instances in the same scene as this spawner. This should only be done at development time if using the Photon relay for any spawn logic.

member.name: M:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1.GetNextSpawnPoint(Fusion.NetworkRunner,Fusion.PlayerRef,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Select the next spawn point using the defined . Override this method to expand on this, such as detecting if a spawn point is blocked.

member.name: M:SpawnPointManagerPrototype`1.AllSpawnPointsBlockedFallback
member.summary: Handling for if all spawn points are blocked.

member.summary: Cycles through all remaining spawn points searching for unblocked. Will return null if all points return == true.
member.param: The index of the first tried SpawnPoints[] element, which was blocked.

member.summary: Override this method with any logic for checking if a spawn point is blocked.

member.summary: Prototyping component for Fusion. Updates the Player's AOI every tick to be a radius around this object.

member.name: F:PlayerAOIPrototype.Radius
member.summary: Radius around this GameObject that defines the Area Of Interest for the InputAuthority of the object. The InputAuthority player of this , will receive updates for any other within this radius.

member.name: T:FusionStats
member.summary: Fusion Telemetry component.

member.name: T:NetworkDebugStartGUI
member.summary: Companion component for . Automatically added as needed for rendering in-game networking IMGUI.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStartGUI.EnableHotkeys
member.summary: When enabled, the in-game user interface buttons can be activated with the keys H (Host), S (Server) and C (Client).

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStartGUI.BaseSkin
member.summary: The GUISkin to use as the base for the scalable in-game UI.

member.name: T:NetworkDebugStart
member.summary: A Fusion prototyping class for starting up basic networking. Add this component to your startup scene, and supply a . Can be set to automatically startup the network, display an in-game menu, or allow simplified start calls like .

member.name: T:NetworkDebugStart.StartModes
member.summary: Selection for how will behave at startup.

member.name: T:NetworkDebugStart.Stage
member.summary: The current stage of connection or shutdown.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.RunnerPrefab
member.summary: Supply a Prefab or a scene object which has the component on it, as well as any runner dependent components which implement , such as or your own custom INetworkInput implementations.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.StartMode
member.summary: Select how network startup will be triggered. Automatically, by in-game menu selection, or exclusively by script.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.AutoStartAs
member.summary: When is set to , this option selects if the will be started as a dedicated server, or as a host (which is a server with a local player).

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.AutoHideGUI
member.summary: will not render GUI elements while == .

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.AutoClients
member.summary: The number of client instances that will be created if running in Mulit-Peer Mode. When using the Select start mode, this number will be the default value for the additional clients option box.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.ServerPort
member.summary: The port that server/host will use.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.DefaultRoomName
member.summary: The default room name to use when connecting to photon cloud.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.AlwaysShowStats
member.summary: Will automatically enable once peers have finished connecting.

member.name: F:NetworkDebugStart.InitialScenePath
member.summary: The Scene that will be loaded after network shutdown completes (all peers have disconnected). If this field is null or invalid, will be set to the current scene when runs Awake().

member.name: P:NetworkDebugStart.CurrentStage
member.summary: Indicates which step of the startup process is currently in.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartSinglePlayer
member.summary: Start a single player instance.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartServer
member.summary: Start a server instance.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartHost
member.summary: Start a host instance. This is a server instance, with a local player.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartClient
member.summary: Start a client instance.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartServerPlusClients
member.summary: Start a Fusion server instance, and the number of client instances indicated by . InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartHostPlusClients
member.summary: Start a Fusion host instance, and the number of client instances indicated by . InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartServerPlusClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start a Fusion server instance, and the indicated number of client instances. InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartHostPlusClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start a Fusion host instance (server with local player), and the indicated number of additional client instances. InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartMultipleClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start a Fusion host instance (server with local player), and the indicated number of additional client instances. InstanceMode must be set to Multi-Peer mode, as this requires multiple instances.

member.name: M:NetworkDebugStart.StartMultipleSharedClients(System.Int32)
member.summary: Start as Room on the Photon cloud, and connects as one or more clients.

member.name: T:FusionScalableIMGUI

member.summary: Modifies a skin to make it scale with screen height.

member.name: F:ControllerPrototype.Speed
